author: Simon Difford
description: It's common to pair Scotch whisky with apple, and Bison Grass vodka with apple juice, but combining these three with acidic wine and rich honey adds sweet 'n' sour complexity.
name: R U Bobby Moore?
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
10 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
